alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Columbus and north central Horry Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loris, or 18 miles northeast of Conway, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tabor City, Loris, Goretown, Allsbrook and Loris Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
